params.about_text: Pranav is a lead solution architect with experience in current technologies and frameworks. He is an expert in full stack web development, cloud migration, AI/ML, digital automation and CRM. He holds an Engineering Degree in Electronics and Communication from SRM University, Chennai. He's a CISCO Certified Network Engineer and has worked as a Network Engineer with CISCO, Bangalore. He's passionate about creating innovative technology solutions, resolving issues and eager to learn newer technologies. As a member on technology forums he regularly contributes/shares his solutions and researches. Loves to spend his spare time caring for stray animals and training the underprivileged.
